mapper.select:
select
from car_auction_bid_record t1 where t1.auction_car_id=#{auctionCarId} order by t1.id desc limit 0,1

SELECT t1.id, t1.auction_id, t1.car_id, t1.auction_car_id, t1.customer_id, t1.bid_fee, t1.add_fee, t1.bid_time FROM car_auction_bid_record t1 where t1.auction_car_id = #{auctionCarId} order by bid_fee desc,id desc limit 1
SELECT count(t1.id) FROM car_auction_bid_record t1 where t1.auction_car_id = #{auctionCarId}
select count(*) from (SELECT count(t1.id) FROM car_auction_bid_record t1 where t1.auction_car_id = #{auctionCarId} group by t1.customer_id) t2

SELECT t1.id, t1.auction_id, t1.car_id, t1.auction_car_id, t1.customer_id, t1.bid_fee, t1.add_fee, t1.bid_time FROM car_auction_bid_record t1 WHERE t1.car_id = #{carId} AND t1.auction_id = #{autoAuctionId} ORDER BY t1.bid_fee DESC,t1.id DESC limit 0,1
